title: An Ionian team? :)
body:
Hey everyone, it's Aerie again :)

So I was thinking of organizing an Ionian team where I could be the support, Karma. I'm looking for people who main these champions:

Top: Irelia
Jungle: Master Yi
Mid: Syndra
ADC: Varus.

I'm mainly looking for gold and silver players. If you're interested in having some games, add me and/or comment this post so we can discuss this! Also, the composition of the Ionian team can AND must be debated. Not everyone will agree that Syndra and Karma on the same team is believable considering their backgrounds and ideals. 
There you go, see y'all around and good luck on the rift! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
Aerie

replies.body:
screw. master. yi.

only sad people with no life use him, let alone main him.

lee jungle much better. also adds some more tank to the team.

shen zed yasuo lee akali kennen soraka bard(somewhat because he came to the world through ionia)

Id much rather have a Yi jungle than a Lee (even though i hate both of them)
just because lee has such a high pick rate I'm so fucking bored of having 2 Lee-sin's in EVERY game! plz variety RIOT!!
Why not have Udyr he is an Ionian and he way better then Yi and Lee Sin.

Top: Yasuo
Jung: Yi
Mid: Zed

oops you you've already won you don't even need ADC or Supp :S

but i like how you're making a themed team! id love to make a Shuriman one and have a war! if only i had the time tho xD

I love Irelia count me in.

Only problem with an Ionian team is that you have to have Varus adc there is no other 'good' adc.
